Description: Variable this grouping level is for.
Value of the variable we are grouping by
If the group is a categorical variable, then the description of the category in the group_by_value column. Otherwise NA
What sex this row is grouped under. Allowed values are, "male", "female" and "NA" for not grouped under a sex
Percentile observation value where the percentile_number is for eg. 2_5 for 2.5th percentile, 75 for 75th percentile etc.

Notes: for continuous variables which does not have any other components such as splines
for first component use _rsc1, for second component use _rcs2, etc.
for binary category use _cat1, for three categories use _cat3, etc.
